snippet: Southern Illinois’s men’s team made it back home after an unexpected overnight stay on the floor of a church.
abstract: Southern Illinois’s men’s basketball team made it back home after an unexpected overnight stay on the floor of a church when team bus became stuck in snowdrift.
lead_paragraph: Southern Illinois’s men’s team made it back home after an unexpected overnight stay on the floor of a church.

headline.main: Southern Illinois Team Bus Is Stranded
